parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - ListNBox

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the additional integer value in the item with the given position of the 2D listbox.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[lnbValue]] [idc, [row, column]]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> row: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> column: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> ctrl [[lnbValue]] [row, column]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> ctrl: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> row: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> column: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_ctrl [[lnbValue]] [0,0]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>1, default is 0 if value is [[String]] set by [[lnbSetValue]]</value></part></template> </code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[lnbAddArray]], [[lnbAddColumn]], [[lnbAddRow]], [[lnbClear]], [[lnbColor]], [[lnbCurSelRow]], [[lnbData]], [[lnbDeleteColumn]], [[lnbDeleteRow]], [[lnbGetColumnsPosition]], [[lnbPicture]], [[lnbSetColor]], [[lnbSetColumnsPos]], [[lnbSetCurSelRow]], [[lnbSetData]], [[lnbSetPicture]], [[lnbSetText]], [[lnbSetValue]], [[lnbSize]], [[lnbText]]
</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
